text: Ine ndidzawabisila zizindikiro zanga anthu a odzikweza ndi ochita zoipa mopanda chilungamo padziko ngakhale kuti iwo ataona chizindikiro china chilichonse, sadzachikhulupirira. Ngati aona njira yoyenera, iwo sadzaitsata, koma akaona njira yopotoka, iwo adzaitsatira iyo; chifukwa chakuti iwo adakana zizindikiro zathu ndipo sadafune kuzimvera ayi
